mapper.select: SELECT o.op_id, c.cont_id, c.production_id, c.cust_name, c.product_name, c.cont_qty, p.product_qty, c.due_date, o.op_process, o.op_date, o.op_emp FROM contract c LEFT JOIN out_product o ON o.cont_id = c.cont_id LEFT JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.cont_status = 0 ORDER BY op_process, op_id DESC, c.cont_id DESC;

SELECT o.order_id, o.due_date, o.order_date, o.order_emp, i.in_id, i.in_process, o.in_date, i.in_emp, m.ma_name, o.order_qty, o.add_ma, m.ma_qty, m.shelt_position FROM in_material i, material m, orders o WHERE m.ma_id = o.ma_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id AND o.order_id = #{order_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE orders o LEFT JOIN material m ON o.ma_id = m.ma_id SET o.add_ma = o.order_qty + m.ma_qty WHERE order_id = #{order_id}
UPDATE material m LEFT JOIN orders o ON m.ma_id = o.ma_id SET m.ma_qty = m.ma_qty + o.order_qty WHERE o.order_id = #{order_id} AND m.ma_id = #{ma_id} AND order_status = 1
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders o LEFT JOIN in_material i ON o.order_id = i.order_id LEFT JOIN material m ON o.ma_id = m.ma_id WHERE order_status = 1 ORDER BY in_process ASC, in_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders o LEFT JOIN in_material i ON o.order_id = i.order_id LEFT JOIN material m ON o.ma_id = m.ma_id WHERE order_status = 1 ORDER BY in_process ASC, in_id DESC limit 0, 10

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders o LEFT JOIN in_material i ON o.order_id = i.order_id LEFT JOIN material m ON o.ma_id = m.ma_id WHERE order_status = 1 AND ${selector} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') ORDER BY in_process ASC, in_id DESC limit 0, 10
